titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the third Thursday of April as "Rachel's Challenge: A Day of Kindness and Compassion" in honor of the triumph and hope stemming from the life of Rachel Scott and in memoriam of the Columbine High School tragedy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 7/28/2010--Introduced. Supports the designation of Rachel's Challenge: A Day of Kindness and Compassion. Honors the life and accomplishments of Rachel Scott and her challenge to start a chain reaction of kindness and compassion. Recognizes Rachel's Challenge for delivering her legacy to the world. Remembers the victims of the Columbine school tragedy, their families, friends, and everyone affected by the tragedy.
